title: How will Scotland plug its £1.5bn budget shortfall?
description: Finance secretary Shona Robison must explain how she will fill an estimated £1.5bn hole in Scotland's books when she delivers her £60bn budget later. Options on the table include tax rises for higher earners, spending cuts for government departments, and public sector job losses.

title: General Election 'will be held in 2024', Prime Minister confirms
description: The next UK General Election will be held in 2024, the Prime Minister has confirmed tonight (Monday). There had been reports the polls could be held in January 2025 under the Fixed Term Parliament Act.

title: El-Sissi wins Egypt’s presidential election to secure third term in office
description: Egyptian President Abdel Fattah el-Sissi, who has ruled with an unquestioned grip for the past nine years, won re-election to a third, six-year term in office, election authorities said on Monday. He ran against three virtually unknown opponents.

title: Sunak raises concerns about Gaza death toll as senior Tories push for ceasefire
